title: All the plots involved in any S
clause_text: All the plots involved in any S.R.S., under which ex-situ rehabilitation of hutments dwellers is envisaged, shall be notionally treated as one, for the purpose of computation of F.S.I.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: All the plots involved in any S.R.S., under which ex-situ rehabilitation of hutments dwellers is envisaged, shall be notionally treated as one, for the purpose of computation of F.S.I.
